name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy pasta with pancetta, egg, and parmesan cheese.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh salad with romaine, croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion in a bun.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted fresh sushi including nigiri and rolls.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake with chocolate frosting.

name: Pad Thai
description: Thai stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and vegetables.

name: Parfait
description: Layered dessert with yogurt, granola, and fresh fruits.

name: Tacos
description: Soft tortillas filled with seasoned meat, vegetables, and salsa.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup.
